Would be nice if you lost slightly less LP than normal if you have way better scores than your teammates? 

So you can go 10/2/4 with 260CS on a loss as a carry mid and loose like 15LP whereas the 1/14/2 Yasuo top would loose the standard -20LP (or whatever he's loosing due to his MMR).

In my opinion autofill is a nice and a rly bad thing. Im an adc main, was platinum 3 in season 4 and then i stopped playing. Now i come back and it feeling that around 8/10 supporter are never played that role. They just sitting around or are extremly aggresive or don´t care enough and get killed over and over again.

My view is, the most people don´t even try to are able to play every role now, cause they get most times that role they wanna play now. This is rly horrible for the bot lane, for both adc, the own team and enemy team. It just feeling who has more luck to get a real supp or just a jgl that have to autofill. 

In 2014/2015 it feels for me, that much more player have known, its a ranked, it is not sure that i can do my role, i have to known at least all roles at a minimum level for my elo. Just my opinion, so pls Riot do something!

Autofill is nice on one hand for players like me that want improve in every role but focus on 1, but i think there are much more people that want play that 1 role and are extremly fucked up if they have to play other roles. It happen often in my games that someone want to switch or cry allready that they get autofilled. 

Maybe you should get us the option to turn that autofill on and off, so if player rly don´t want to autofill then they have to accept a longer waiting time but they can play what they realy want and are able to. And the players who are able or just want to autofill sometimes have shorter que, that their profit.
